name: hess
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(whe(c1, c2), whe(c0, c2)))

stmt.origin: 3imtr4g(wss(c0, c1), whe(c1, c2), whe(c0, c2), wss(cima(c1, c2), c2), wss(cima(c0, c2), c2))
stmt.pretty: 3imtr4g(c0 ⊆ c1, c1[hereditary]c2, c0[hereditary]c2, (c1 " c2)⊆ c2, (c0 " c2)⊆ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(whe(c1, c2), whe(c0, c2)))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(cima(c1, c2), c2), wss(cima(c0, c2), c2)))
-| wb(whe(c1, c2), wss(cima(c1, c2), c2))
-| wb(whe(c0, c2), wss(cima(c0, c2), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c1[hereditary]c2 → c0[hereditary]c2))
⊣ (c0 ⊆ c1 →((c1 " c2)⊆ c2 →(c0 " c2)⊆ c2))
⊣ (c1[hereditary]c2 ↔(c1 " c2)⊆ c2)
⊣ (c0[hereditary]c2 ↔(c0 " c2)⊆ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(whe(c1, c2), whe(c0, c2)))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(cima(c1, c2), c2), wss(cima(c0, c2), c2)))
-| wb(whe(c1, c2), wss(cima(c1, c2), c2))
-| wb(whe(c0, c2), wss(cima(c0, c2), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c1[hereditary]c2 → c0[hereditary]c2))
⊣ (c0 ⊆ c1 →((c1 " c2)⊆ c2 →(c0 " c2)⊆ c2))
⊣ (c1[hereditary]c2 ↔(c1 " c2)⊆ c2)
⊣ (c0[hereditary]c2 ↔(c0 " c2)⊆ c2)

stmt.origin: syl(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(cima(c1, c2), c2), wss(cima(c0, c2), c2)), wss(cima(c0, c2), cima(c1, c2)))

body.origin:

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c1[hereditary]c2 → c0[hereditary]c2))

⊣ ((c0 " c2)⊆(c1 " c2)→((c1 " c2)⊆ c2 →(c0 " c2)⊆ c2))

comment: Subclass law for relations being herditary over a class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)
